projects.information: Providing a stage for everyone with the passion for music. We created a way for young musicians to spread their passion to new cities and stages. Caroline started in 2006 and rocked her last show in 2015.
Charlie was born on the 1st of May 2022. As a Star Wars fan, I am definetly bitter that he wouldn't wait until may the 4th. But he's kinda cute so I guess we'll keep him.

Max was a cute bengal mix with a big personality in a small fluffy body. He loved eggs and snoot-boops equally. He passed away a month before my son was born and spent his last nights not wanting to leave the baby-crib.
Caroline has been skateboarding her whole life, joining in on many events around the great city of Malm√∂ and some tours around Sweden.
